bill_title: authorize certain haystack movers to exceed vehicle weight restrictions under certain conditions.

bill_versions.bill_text: FOR AN ACT ENTITLED, An Act to authorize certain haystack movers to exceed vehicle weight restrictions under certain conditions. BE IT ENACTED BY THE LEGISLATURE OF THE STATE OF SOUTH DAKOTA: Section 1. That chapter 32-22 be amended by adding thereto a NEW SECTION to read as follows: Notwithstanding the provisions of § 32-22-16, a tractor towed or truck-mounted haystack mover built prior to July 1, 1983, and modified with a third axle so that the combination of axles are spaced more than forty inches and less than nine feet apart, may have a maximum triple axle weight of fifty thousand pounds when two axles are equipped with ten inch dual tires and the third axle is equipped, as a minimum, with eight and one-quarter inch dual tires. A violation of this section is a Class 2 misdemeanor. Section 2. The provisions of this Act apply to the movement of any haystack mover meeting the criteria of this Act since January 1, 2002. 350 copies of this document were printed by the South Dakota Legislative Research Council at a cost of $.027 per page. . Insertions into existing statutes are indicated by underscores. Deletions from existing statutes are indicated by overstrikes.
